name: pymake version 1.2.4
body:
## What's Changed
* feat(meson): add meson build option by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/105
* fix(makefile): add makefile support for shared objects by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/106
* ci: parallel pytest with oneAPI by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/107
* feat(meson): add support for creating meson.build files by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/108
* feat(ftn): add support for CRAY ftn fortran compiler by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/109
* release: version 1.2.4 by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/110


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/compare/1.2.3...1.2.4

name: pymake version 1.2.3
body:
## What's Changed
* refactor(mf2005): update to build mf2005 development version by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/87
* refactor(src_update): refactor src_update to use common functions. by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/88
* feat(switches): add support for compiler switch with spaces by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/89
* feat(_create_win_batch): Add support for OneAPI standard Windows install by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/92
* update(mf6): update for latest version of MODFLOW 6 (6.2.2) by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/94
* fix(triangle): replace 4 byte long with 8 byte long on Windows with icl by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/95
* Accomodate changes in modflow which expect `.dylib` for macOS shared libraries now by @Hofer-Julian in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/96
* refactor(dag): add NetworkX python package as DAG option by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/98
* fix(triangle): fix triangle build on windows with icl by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/99
* fix(setup.cfg): use 'find:' to include submodules; other tidying by @mwtoews in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/102
* feat(makefile): unix newline and line endings in win32 makefiles by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/100
* fix(setup): add usgsprograms.txt to setup.py installation by @jdhughes-usgs in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/103

## New Contributors
* @Hofer-Julian made their first contribution in https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/pull/96

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modflowpy/pymake/compare/1.2.1...1.2.3
